about_the_game:
Echoes of You is an exploration action-adventure game with an interconnected world, and a focus on an emotional narrative where you have to endure the consequences of your choices.

Features

  • Engaging combat, inspired by Sekiro, but mixing it with magic and power-ups.
  • Explore an interconnected map. Find shortcuts, discover ancient secrets, lore and dive into the world full of atmosphere.
  • Challenging boss battles.
  • World not only evolves by the player's decisions, but also by their actions. The player isn't the center of the world though, so events will happen even if the player has no involvement, so you may get into an area and just see the consequences of events you didn't get to see. Or maybe, if you go at the right time, you can see things happen and sometimes change the outcome.
  • Meet different NPCs, some can be friendly, some not. It can also depend on your actions. Follow their quests and discover more about them, the world, and you.
